rules_text: When Flock Herder leaves the battlefield, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
notes:
New card — Replaced Personal Bodyguard

Bodyguard was very generic and could probably fit in the core set if we wanted it for the standard format. Opening up this space for something more synergysitc for the set will be really helpful, especially given colored uncommon slots are fairly tight as-is.
